name: Chummer
description:
This one is a passion project of mine, but we're in extremely early stages. This build probably has about two weeks into it. 

I'm mostly putting it up so I can easily show some friends and pick their brains. If you're passing through and have a thought, I'd be happy to hear it.

I am putting this on hold briefly while I try to smash out Camp Check real quick. There are some systems I'm building in Camp Check which I'll be using in Chummer.
